name: Arcardia
description:
Arcardia is a single-player CCG with a focus on collecting unique cards and building interesting decks. A more relaxed experience than other CCGs, Arcardia combines interesting gameplay with beautiful artwork and player freedom. There are no restrictions on the way you play your deck or cards, and no in app purchases that stop you from growing your collection.

Features include:

- 220+ unique cards
- Easy to play
- Unique elemental energy system
- Complex card combos
- Dynamic AI
- No in app purchases
- Anti-frustration features
